songs.title: COOL
songs.lyrics:
You
Walk away

Here we sit
... mornings
You held on tight last night
Then you ever had before
Here we sit
... mornings
You held on tight last night
Then you ever had before
Then you ever had before


Lover
You’ve already broken my heart
You’ve already broken my heart
Why would you stay?
Lover
You’ve already ripped me apart
You’ve already broken my heart
What would it take, to make you walk away?
W
